body: Apple Staff Unionizing At NYC Store Seek $30 Per Hour https://www.billionaireclubcollc.com/apple-staff-unionizing-at-nyc-store-seek-30-per-hour/ $AAPL

links.title: Apple Staff Unionizing At NYC Store Seek $30 Per Hour
links.description: Apple, Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) store workers in New York City's Grand Central Terminal working toward unionizing have come up with some concrete demands. See Also: How To Buy Apple (AAPL) Shares What Happened: The store workers are urging Apple to pay a minimum hourly wage of $30, among other things, updated information posted on their website showed.

body: #Market Briefing For Tuesday, April 19 $AAPL $MSFT $TSLA $TWTR https://talkmarkets.com/content/us-markets/market-briefing-for-tuesday-april-19?post=351971

links.title: Market Briefing For Tuesday, April 19
links.description: Defensive behavior predictably resumes after a long weekend. However, it has a couple zingers thrown-into the mix, even if financial press extensively is focused just on Twitter/Musk, inflation, and the impact of hawkish monetary or Fed policies. Peak inflation probably relates to China more than even Oil now.

links.title: California ports brace for supply-chain 'hiccups' from Shanghai lockdowns
links.description: If China's disruptive lockdowns persist, they could fuel global inflation, slow the pace of exports shipped from the 'world's factory', and weaken demand in the world's largest consumer market, economists say.

body:
Apple workers call for minimum of $30 per hour as wages 
Read More : https://bit.ly/3JSvyBJ 
$AAPL  #Apple #iphone #employee #wages #business #news

links.title: Candorium
links.description: By Yashasvini Razdan on 19 April 22 | ET * The workers sought improved benefits such as tuition reimbursement The group launched its website over the weekend. They wrote, "For pay, we seek a minimum of $30 for all workers, built upon a matrix based on role, tenure, and performance."
